revision.text: {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject Military history|class=A |A-Class=pass | B1 = y | B2 = y | B3 = y | B4 = y | B5 = y |Muslim=yes|Medieval=yes}} {{WikiProject Middle Ages|class=GA|importance=Low}} {{WikiProject Greece|class=A | b1 = yes | b2 = yes | b3 = yes | b4 = yes | b5 = yes |importance=Low|topic=history|byzantine-task-force=yes}} {{WikiProject Arab world|class=GA|importance=low}} }}{{ArticleHistory |action1=GAN |action1date=20:23, 2 May 2012 |action1link=Talk:Abbasid invasion of Asia Minor (806)/GA1 |action1result=listed |action1oldid=490152716 |action2=WAR |action2date=11:01, 26 June 2012 |action2link=Wikipedia:WikiProject Military history/Assessment/Abbasid invasion of Asia Minor (806) |action2result=approved |action2oldid=498725298 |dykdate=30 March 2012 |dykentry=... that the '''[[Abbasid invasion of Asia Minor (806)|Abbasid invasion of Asia Minor]]''' in 806 was the largest expedition ever launched by the [[Abbasid Caliphate]], and forced [[Byzantine emperor]] [[Nikephoros I]] to pay a [[jizya|head tax]] for himself and his son? |currentstatus=GA |topic=war }} {{Talk:Abbasid invasion of Asia Minor (806)/GA1}} == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just modified {{plural:3|one external link|3 external links}} on [[Abbasid invasion of Asia Minor (806)]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=742200938 my edit]. If you have any questions, or need the bot to ignore the links, or the page altogether, please visit [[User:Cyberpower678/FaQs#InternetArchiveBot|this simple FaQ]] for additional information. I made the following changes: *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20131029190725/http://asiaminor.ehw.gr/Forms/fLemmaBodyExtended.aspx?lemmaid=7896&boithimata_State=&kefalaia_State= to http://asiaminor.ehw.gr/Forms/fLemmaBodyExtended.aspx?lemmaid=7896&boithimata_State=&kefalaia_State=#chapter_1 *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20131029190725/http://asiaminor.ehw.gr/Forms/fLemmaBodyExtended.aspx?lemmaid=7896&boithimata_State=&kefalaia_State= to http://asiaminor.ehw.gr/Forms/fLemmaBodyExtended.aspx?lemmaid=7896&boithimata_State=&kefalaia_State=#chapter_2 *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20131029190725/http://asiaminor.ehw.gr/Forms/fLemmaBodyExtended.aspx?lemmaid=7896&boithimata_State=&kefalaia_State= to http://asiaminor.ehw.gr/Forms/fLemmaBodyExtended.aspx?lemmaid=7896&boithimata_State=&kefalaia_State=#chapter_3 When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' or '''failed''' to let others know (documentation at {{tlx|Sourcecheck}}). {{sourcecheck|checked=false}} Cheers.—[[User:InternetArchiveBot|'''InternetArchiveBot''']] ([[User talk:InternetArchiveBot|Report bug]]) 08:07, 2 October 2016 (UTC)
